PageDescription: Collaborate on documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and forms in Chamilo using ONLYOFFICE Docs

WorkWithinChamilo: Work on office documents within the Chamilo structure
DocumentsTab1Label: View and edit text documents, spreadsheets, presentations and fillable forms.
DocumentsTab2Label: Share providing Edit or Read Only permissions.
DocumentsTab3Label: Co-author documents in real time, track changes and leave comments.
DocumentsTab4Label: Communicate using built-in chat or video conferencing tools, like Jisti or Rainbow.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Chamilo
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for Chamilo now on GitHub.
Reason1: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper.</0>
Reason2: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Open source code available on GitHub.
Reason3: Integration with <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</0> solution with no installation required.
Reason4: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason5: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
Reason6: Self-hosted solution. Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial.</0> Educational discounts.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
